scripts.key:generate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const crypto = require('crypto'); const appKey = crypto.randomBytes(32).toString('base64'); const envFilePath = '.env'; let envFileContent = fs.readFileSync(envFilePath, 'utf-8'); envFileContent = envFileContent.includes('APP_KEY=') ? envFileContent.replace(/APP_KEY=.*/, `APP_KEY=base64:${appKey}`) : envFileContent + `\nAPP_KEY=base64:${appKey}`; fs.writeFileSync(envFilePath, envFileContent, 'utf-8'); console.log('App Key Generated!');"
